# Python cache files
__pycache__/
*.pyc
*.pyo
*.pyd

# Virtual environment folders
venv/
env/

# Excel / data files generated by the project
*.xlsx
*.csv
*.xlsm
*.tmp

# System files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# Jupyter backup / checkpoints (if used)
.ipynb_checkpoints/

# VS Code settings
.vscode/
